title: Subscribe
content: Mostly technical videos including talks covering Cloud, Mobile, Cognitive and other aspects of Software programming and engineering. Expect a few music videos here and there as I love listening to music and coding.

title: Tutorials to get your mobile development up and running
content: Recently, we announced new tutorials to get you started on IBM Cloud. In continuation of our effort to bring in structured and well-defined tutorials, we are adding mobile section where you can Easily follow step-by-step instructions.

title: WatBot: A Voice-enabled Android Chatbot
content: WatBot is a Voice-enabled Android Native ChatBot built using Watson Conversation, Speech to Text and Text to Speech Services on IBM Cloud

title: A walkthrough of IBM Cloud - Vidyasagar Machupalli
content: IBM innovators and industry thinkers emphasized on the latest trends of cloud-led business transformation at IBM Cloud Innovation Forum 2016.

title: Vidyasagar Machupalli on IBM Cloud Tools for Swift
content: Vidyasagar Machupalli (Developer Advocate, IBM Cloud & Mobile) introduces client and server code in Swift using IBM Cloud Tools for Swift.

title: Vidyasagar S Machupalli on building a chatbot with ease
content: Hear from Vidyasagar S Machupalli (Developer Advocate and Technical Offering Manager, IBM Cloud) on how #WatsonConversation helps in building a chatbot with ease.
